label: Justine, Jean-Lou.  2005. Species of Pseudorhabdosynochus Yamaguti, 1958 (Monogenea: Diplectanidae) from Epinephelus fasciatus and E. merra (Perciformes: Serranidae) off New Caledonia and other parts of the Indo-Pacific Ocean, with a comparison of measurements of specimens prepared with different methods, and a description of P. caledonicus n. sp. Systematic Parasitology 62: 1-37.
value: Justine, Jean-Lou.  2005. Systematic Parasitology 62: 1-37.
